question.title: Android Text Prediction for the keyboard in TextField libgdx
question.body:
If I use a TextField or TextArea, the default keyboard is a number and letter keyboard, but I want to use a hint keyboard. I know that by changing the filter, I can only access the number pad, but I can't find a way to access the hint pad.

loginTxtField.setOnscreenKeyboard(new TextField.OnscreenKeyboard() {
    @Override
    public void show(boolean visible) {
        if (visible) {
            Gdx.input.getTextInput(new Input.TextInputListener() {
                @Override
                public void input(String text) {
                    loginTxtField.setText(text);
                  
                    onLoginTextChanged(text);
                }
                
                @Override
                public void canceled() {
                   
                }
            }, "login", loginTxtField.getText(), "login");
        }
    } });
